text: 13.25: Sng 32.6; Ais 55.6; Mt 7.23; 25.10-12; Ru 6.46Mbe mbara muuŋv kɨrim, mba ŋgu namkam khavgip wo ŋgun vhen veri thɨmkamani puigirga. Ana wo ŋgun vhen veri thɨmkamani puigirim, nde zɨv ana ŋgun thɨmkamani thivgip, anan kamɨnga. Nde ana kamɨv khaŋ ana suanga, ‘Guma Rum, Guma Rum, ndu nza ndi thɨma fhɨrik!’ Nde maaŋ suanga, ana nde ŋgarkarav khaŋ nde suanga, ‘Gu nde kaŋgi fhuvara, gu vhɨra nde kega zegi ŋgu kaŋgi fhu.’
